1549014898_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body:
=> search function like one at [ZeroTorrent](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/), only smaller search field under some button or icon maybe
=> auto increase users limit of published content (USED: x/20K) by lets say 1K every day to prevent reaching limit on admin abandoned sites in future
=> [downvotes](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroTalk/issues/9) / flag as a spam option. Topics flagged Too many times will disappear from public until site admin/moderators will put them back or delete permanently. such topic can no longer be put for moderation unless author will modify it.

Source: [ZeroTalk improvements wishlist - ZeroDevTalk](/142jqssVAj2iRxMACJg2dzipB5oicZYz5w/?Topic:1516747912_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1tPFxE/ZeroTalk+improvements+wishlist)
good work, nice and important to do. thank you

1616666284_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body:
I was asking same question (title of this discussion thread) 2 years ago [here](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1555156444_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)

> There are many interesting discussions and pull requests there. How can we back up them?

maybe this can help:
https://hackage.haskell.org/package/github-backup
https://github.com/IQAndreas/github-issues-import

> A website for distributing binaries for Windows?

chinese government blocked zeronet.io site i think, they not blocked github, so this may be hosted on github (https://pages.github.com ?), fosshub, gitlab or such.

> .bit domains, registered by nofish. We cannot rely on them any more?

[possibly no](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1516098717_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS), maybe the new zeronet maintainers should convert zerotalk, etc. databases contents .bit links to real addresses (maybe i can help with that) and setup new zerotalk etc site which will have contents of nofish's zerotalk.

> nofish's ZeroMe hubs. Well, it is a problem

i think it is lower priority task, but zeronet or zerome should be made to allow migration of a user profile between hubs, relevant Zerotalk topics: [#1](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ), [#2](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1513334954_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6)
